heading.title: A new model for open collaboration
heading.description: Run an organization where members get rewarded for their contributions with fractional ownership.

heading.title: Reimagining what it means to work
heading.description: Teams and communities using Open Enterprise fundamentally unlock a reality of work that reimagines how people engage in economic opportunity, meeting the demands and expectations of a modern organization.

heading.title: Modern workforce
heading.description: Multistakeholder governance aligns employees with the organization’s wider community.

heading.title: Meritocratic by design
heading.description: Tokenized ownership aligns deeply committed individuals with the organization’s success..

heading.title: Engineered for Engineered for resilience
heading.description: Open Enterprise supports best practices in sociocratic management.

heading.title: Kickstart an organization with your co-founders
heading.description: It’s the early days, you just had a long conversation with two friends about a meaningful challenge that you’re all passionate about and have a potential solution for. You’re ready to embark the startup journey.

heading.title: Onboard users, investors and advisors as you grow
heading.description: You’ve bootstrapped and delivered an MVP, and some investors and advisors are interested in having a chat with you. As an Open Enterprise, you can onboard them seamlessly into your digital organization and align them with your success.

heading.title: Write a how-to on Open Enterprise
heading.description: Looking for an amazing copywriter using Open Enterprise to help us write an article on how to get started.

heading.title: Engage highly committed contributors
heading.description: As an Open Enterprise ourselves, we are actively looking for new talent to join our mission of improving and delivering the Open Enterprise model to the world. Apply for open tasks and earn a stake in our success.

heading.title: Help us improve Open Enterprise
heading.description: You’ve bootstrapped and delivered an MVP, and some investors and advisors are interested in having a chat with you. As an Open Enterprise, you can onboard them seamlessly into your digital organization and align them with your success.

heading.title: Ideate a list of features based on the Sociocracy model
heading.description: We’re looking for someone interested in business theory and research that’ll help us bridge the gap between our s...

heading.title: Update documentation with FAQs
heading.description: Review our community chat for the most frequently asked questions and document answers for our product docs.

heading.title: Tutorial video series
heading.description: Create a series of video tutorials that cover everything from start to finish on using Open Enterprise.

heading.title: Start an Open Enterprise
heading.description: If you can’t wait to run a new or existing organization on Open Enterprise and are willing to explore and navigate the beta, we’d love to get you started.

inventor.name: Jassir Jonis
inventor.description: Hey guys, love what you’re doing and I’m convinced that together we’ll achieve amazing things.
